context: Netflix, Inc. is a streaming entertainment service focused on subscription video streaming and original content production. Ad tier and password sharing crackdown drove growth.

competitors.name: Disney+

competitors.notes: Streaming included with Prime, adding live sports

competitors.name: Max (HBO)

competitors.notes: Largest video platform, YouTube TV for live
